recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a skillet, cook ground beef until browned. Add chopped onions and minced garlic. Cook until onions are soft.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve spaghetti topped with the meat sauce and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Slice chicken breast into thin strips.
Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through.
Add sliced bell peppers, onions, and carrots. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil. Cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet over medium heat. Drain excess fat.
Warm tortillas in a separate skillet or in the microwave.
Assemble tacos by filling each tortilla with cooked beef, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, grated cheese, and salsa.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough. Top with sliced mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil over the pizza.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
steps: Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a salad bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad.
Toss well to coat evenly.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
steps: In a large pot, brown beef stew meat over medium-high heat.
Add chopped onions, carrots, and potatoes. Cook until vegetables start to soften.
Stir in beef broth and tomato paste. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1-2 hours, until beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add chopped onions and cook until softened.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add diced potatoes, carrots, bell peppers, and coconut milk. Bring to a simmer and cook until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Pancakes
steps: In a mixing bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat eggs, then stir in milk and melted butter.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined.

Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown on the other side.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add sliced chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through.
Pour in heavy cream and grated Parmesan cheese. Stir until the sauce thickens.
Toss cooked pasta in the sauce until well coated. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Burritos
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat. Season with taco seasoning.
Warm tortillas in the microwave or on a skillet. Spread a spoonful of refried beans on each tortilla.
Layer cooked rice, seasoned beef, shredded cheese, and salsa onto each tortilla.
Fold in the sides and roll up tightly to form burritos.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Add diced potatoes and cook until tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.

recipes.name: Omelette
steps: In a bowl, beat eggs until well mixed. Season with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Pour in beaten eggs.
As the eggs begin to set, lift the edges with a spatula and tilt the skillet to let the uncooked eggs flow underneath.
Sprinkle shredded cheese, diced ham, sliced bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms over one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half of the omelette over the filling. Cook for a few more minutes until the cheese is melted and the omelette is cooked through.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions. Let cool completely.
In a large skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Add more oil to the skillet if needed. Stir in diced carrots, peas, and any other desired vegetables. Cook until tender.
Add cooked rice to the skillet, breaking up any clumps. Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil.
Return scrambled eggs to the skillet and toss everything together until well combined.

recipes.name: BBQ Ribs
steps: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C).
Season pork ribs with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder.
Wrap ribs tightly in aluminum foil and place on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 2.5 to 3 hours, until tender.
Remove ribs from the foil and brush with BBQ sauce.
Grill ribs over medium-high heat for 10-15 minutes, basting with additional BBQ sauce, until caramelized.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque.
Stir in lemon juice, chopped parsley, and cooked pasta. Toss until well coated.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Arrange alternating slices of tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil leaves on a serving platter.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Chicken Enchiladas
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a skillet, cook diced chicken breast until no longer pink. Stir in enchilada sauce and heat through.
Spread a spoonful of the chicken mixture onto each tortilla. Roll up tightly and place seam-side down in a baking dish.
Pour additional enchilada sauce over the rolled tortillas. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Heat a skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread.
Place a slice of bread, butter-side down, on the skillet. Top with cheese slices and another slice of bread, butter-side up.
Cook until golden brown on the bottom, then flip and cook until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown on the other side.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onions and minced garlic. Cook until softened.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 1-2 minutes, until rice is lightly toasted.
Gradually add hot vegetable broth, one ladleful at a time, stirring frequently until absorbed.
Stir in sliced mushrooms and continue adding broth until rice is creamy and tender.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad
steps: In a mixing bowl, combine drained canned tuna, mayonnaise, diced celery, chopped onions, pickle relish, and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Mix well to combine.
Serve tuna salad on sandwiches, wraps, or over a bed of lettuce.

recipes.name: Beef Chili
steps: In a large pot, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add chopped onions, diced peppers, and minced garlic. Cook until vegetables are softened.
Stir in kidney beans, tomato sauce, chili powder, and any other desired spices.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with shredded cheese, diced onions, and sour cream as toppings.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken
steps: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, minced garlic, and lemon zest.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken breasts and cook until golden brown on both sides and cooked through.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the chicken before serving.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Slice eggplant into 1/4-inch thick rounds. Dip each slice into beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Place breaded eggplant slices on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, until golden brown and tender.
Spread marinara sauce in the bottom of a baking dish. Layer baked eggplant slices, mozzarella cheese, and Parmesan cheese. Repeat layers.
Bake for an additional 20-25 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: Beef Lasagna
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat. Stir in marinara sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
In a separate bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, and beaten eggs.
Spread a layer of meat sauce in the bottom of a baking dish. Layer with cooked noodles, ricotta mixture, and shredded mozzarella cheese. Repeat layers.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, until bubbly and golden.

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery. Cook until softened.
Add diced chicken breast and cook until browned.
Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add egg noodles and cook until tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.

recipes.name: Cobb Salad
steps: Arrange chopped lettuce in a large salad bowl.
Top with sliced grilled chicken breast, diced avocado, hard-boiled eggs, crispy bacon strips, and diced tomatoes.
Drizzle with your favorite dressing and sprinkle with crumbled blue cheese or shredded cheddar cheese.

recipes.name: Pulled Pork Sandwiches
steps: Season pork with salt, pepper, and any desired spices. Place in a slow cooker.
Pour BBQ sauce over the pork and cook on low for 6-8 hours, until tender and easily shredded with a fork.
Shred the pork using two forks and mix with the BBQ sauce.
Serve pulled pork on hamburger buns with coleslaw on top.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Let cool completely.
In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, finely chopped red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and chopped parsley.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Warm tortillas in the microwave or on a skillet.
Spread Caesar dressing over each tortilla.
Top with sliced grilled chicken breast, chopped lettuce, grated Parmesan cheese, and croutons.
Roll up tightly to form wraps.

recipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
steps: Slice beef sirloin into thin strips. Marinate in soy sauce, ginger, and minced garlic for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add beef and stir-fry until browned.
Add sliced bell peppers, broccoli florets, sliced carrots, and any other desired vegetables. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet. Season with salt, pepper, minced garlic, chopped dill, and a squeeze of lemon juice.
Dot the tops of the salmon with small cubes of butter.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, until salmon flakes easily with a fork.

recipes.name: Vegetable Lasagna
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, cook chopped onions and minced garlic until softened. Add sliced zucchini, yellow squash, and chopped spinach. Cook until vegetables are tender.
In a baking dish, layer marinara sauce, cooked noodles, sautéed vegetables, ricotta cheese, shredded mozzarella cheese, and marinara sauce again. Repeat layers.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, until bubbly and golden.

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken until golden brown on both sides.
Transfer chicken to a baking dish. Top with marinara sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add minced garlic and sliced onions. Cook until fragrant.
Add sliced bell peppers, broccoli florets, snap peas, and any other desired vegetables. Stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil. Cook for another minute.

recipes.name: Beef Wellington
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Season beef tenderloin with salt and pepper. Sear in a hot skillet until browned on all sides. Let cool.
Spread Dijon mustard over the cooled beef. Wrap in prosciutto slices.
Roll out puff pastry and place beef in the center. Fold pastry over the beef to enclose.
Brush pastry with beaten egg. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until pastry is golden brown and beef is cooked to desired doneness.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and place on a baking sheet.
Spread Alfredo sauce over the dough. Top with sliced grilled chicken breast, shredded mozzarella cheese, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Sprinkle minced garlic over the pizza.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

recipes.name: Hamburger
steps: Season ground beef with salt and pepper. Form into patties.
Heat a skillet or grill over medium-high heat. Cook patties for 4-5 minutes per side, until browned and cooked through.
Toast hamburger buns on the grill or in a toaster.
Assemble burgers by placing cooked patties on toasted buns. Top with lettuce, tomato slices, onion slices, ketchup, and mustard.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add chopped onions and cook until softened.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add diced potatoes, carrots, bell peppers, and any other desired vegetables. Cook until vegetables are tender.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add sliced onions and cook until softened.
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until browned. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, brown sliced beef sirloin. Stir in beef broth and sour cream. Cook until heated through.
Return cooked mushrooms to the skillet. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve beef stroganoff over cooked egg noodles.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season tilapia fillets with salt, pepper, and any desired spices.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Cook fish fillets for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Warm tortillas in the microwave or on a skillet.
Flake cooked fish and place on warmed tortillas. Top with shredded cabbage, sliced avocado, salsa, and a squeeze of lime juice.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat pesto sauce over medium heat. Add halved cherry tomatoes and cooked pasta. Toss until well coated.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese and toasted pine nuts.
Serve hot, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley if desired.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadillas
steps: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Place a flour tortilla in the skillet.
Sprinkle shredded cheese over half of the tortilla. Top with cooked diced chicken, salsa, and sour cream.
Fold the other half of the tortilla over the filling. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown and crispy.
Cut quesadilla into wedges and serve hot.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
steps: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onions and minced garlic. Cook until softened.
Stir in diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer and cook for 15-20 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in cream and chopped basil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with croutons on
